div.p: My name is Chris and I work in hospitality. I work in hospitality, my parents own a tea room and I run their front of house for them, I deal with any customer service
bookings, emails, I deal with any complaints, I run the staff quotas for them and make sure everything is running smoothly. We are a quintessential English tea
room, old teapots, teacups the whole lot; scones, cakes... Very English, very English
